Title: Welcome to the Tombs
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Glen Mazzara
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden, Norman Reedus
Plot: As Rick and the group prepare for the Governor's impending attack, Andrea fights to escape captivity.
